title: Halloween, Kevin Hart, Carla's Reality Update, Sheryl Underwood and more.
itunes:title: Halloween, Kevin Hart, Carla's Reality Update, Sheryl Underwood and more.
description:
Good morning and welcome to the ride! This show is dedicated to those who live their lives in possibilities. Steve is in Dubai. Carla talks about her Halloween plans. J. Anthony Brown speaks about John Witherspoon. Uncle Steve gives us the signs that you are too old to trick or treat. Kevin Hart has an epiphany after his car accident. Sheryl Underwood tells us the two things that she and Junior have in common. Miss Carla talks about Thomas Miles and Ready to Love in Reality Update. Congratulations to The Washington Nationals on their first World Series Title. The entire State of California is under red flag warnings due to the fires. Today as we close the show, Uncle Steve has proof on why Fool #1 in not cute and more.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
